name: Supersonic Fever
description:
Reflexes and skills are everything in this adrenalinic endless game.
Move the ball along a randomly-generated road full of obstacles, should you avoid them and risk everything or try to use your shooting ability? 

  • 1 bit colors for a really 2D pixel art experience
  • Fully randomly generated road
  • Easy to learn, hard to master
  • Online leaderboard, show the world who's the best!

A game by AlexoFalco, Victroium

Music by Nicole Marie T
